name: react-audio-visualizer
description: A react component that visualizes audio files

scripts.build:lib: npm run lint && rm -rf lib && parcel build ./src/react-audio-visualizer.js --out-file index.js -d lib --no-minify --no-source-maps
scripts.build:demo: npm run lint && rm -rf demo && parcel build example/index.html -d demo --public-url ./ --no-source-maps

author: Leopoldthecoder
